hero.subheader: Cornell is big. Orientation week is messy. With O-Week, new students can find orientation week events, keep track of their favorites, and know where and when to go.

features.title: Find It.
features.description: Search for new events by keyword.

features.title: Remind Me.
features.description: Be notified before any events required for your major.

features.title: Get There.
features.description: Directions to any event are just a tap away.
